header_add_manual: How to Add New Language Manually
convert_error: An error occurred while converting quests: {e}
translate_error: An error occurred while translating quests: {e}
translate_same_lang: The source language and the destination language are the same.
uploader_ftbq_quest: Upload all the quest files (`.snbt`) in the `config/ftbquests/quests` folder of the modpack to localize. [Max: {max} files]
uploader_bqm_quest: Upload the quest file (`DefaultQuests.json`) in the `config/betterquesting` folder of the modpack to localize.
uploader_ftbq_lang: Upload the language file (`.json`) in the `kubejs/assets/kubejs/lang` folder of the modpack to localize.
uploader_bqm_lang: Upload the language file (`.lang`) in the `resources/betterquesting/lang` folder of the modpack to localize.
uploader_help: You can upload multiple files at once by selecting multiple files in the file selection dialog.
uploader_exceed: You can upload **up to {max} file(s)** at once.
modpack_label: Enter the shortened name of the modpack. [Example: All the Mods 9 â†’ atm9]
modpack_help: This name will be used as the namespace for localization.
lang_exist_warning: If there are **only few lines** in the language file, it may **not be the quest language file**. Please check the file manually.
lang_exist_label: Do you already have language file in your modpack? Check it in the `{lang_dir}` folder. (The directory may vary depending on the modpack.)
lang_exist_help: If you have language file, you can skip the converting process and directly translate the language file.
auto_translate_label: Do you want to translate the quests automatically using Google Translate?
auto_translate_help: If you select 'Yes', the quests will be translated automatically using Google Translate.
src_label: Select the language of the quests you uploaded.
src_help: This is the language of the quests you uploaded.
dest_label: Select the language you want to translate the quests into.
dest_help: This is the language you want to translate the quests into.
localize_help: Click this button to start localization.
apply_manual_2_1: 2. Extract `{filename}` and replace the original `.{quest_ext}` files in `{quest_dir}` folder with the extracted files.
apply_manual_2_2: 2. Replace the original `.{quest_ext}` file in `{quest_dir}` folder with the downloaded `{filename}`.
apply_manual_5_1: 5. Done! If you want to fix mistranslated text, edit `{dest}.{lang_ext}` with text editor.
apply_manual_lang_2: 2. Put `{dest}.{lang_ext}` in `{lang_dir}` folder (or the folder where the original `{src}.{lang_ext}` is located).
apply_manual_lang_3: 3. Done! If you want to fix mistranslated text, edit `{dest}.{lang_ext}` with text editor.
apply_manual_warning: **Do not change the key** of the `.{lang_ext}` file. (e.g. `{example}`)
add_manual_3: 3. Translate the text in `{src}.{lang_ext}` and put the translated text in `<language>.{lang_ext}` with text editor. You may use this localization tool or any translator to translate the text.
add_manual_4: 4. Put `<language>.{lang_ext}` in `{lang_dir}` folder (or the folder where the original `{src}.{lang_ext}` is located).
add_manual_warning: The translated text should be put in `<language>.{lang_ext}`, not in `{src}.{lang_ext}`.
lang_link_help: Click this link to see the list of Minecraft languages.
